item.title: MAT February 2015 exam dates announced
item.description: The All India Management Association (AIMA) has released the exam dates for the first MAT exam for the year 2015.

item.title: BITS Pilani MBA Admissions (2015-16) open
item.description: Applications invited by BITS Pilani for its MBA program (2015-16.)

item.title: RMAT 2014 by AIMA for Ph.D in Business Administration on 13 December
item.description: The All India Management Association (AIMA) has announced the exam dates for Research Management Aptitude Test (RMAT 2014) for admission to the Ph.D (Business Administration)

item.title: Apply Online for MICA's PG Diploma in Management - Communications (PGDM-C) 2015-17
item.description: Online applications are being invited by India's premier college in Marketing and Communication, MICA, for admission to Post Graduate Diploma in Management (Communications) through MICAT 2015.

item.title: IRMA Application Forms 2015 will be available Online from 15 Sep
item.description: IRMA will use CAT 2014 scores for admission to its 2015-17 Post Graduate Diploma in Rural Management (PRM) and 2015 Fellow Programme in Rural Management (FPRM)

item.title: Apply online by 13 April for Symbiosis Entrance Test (SET 2014) for UG programs in Law, Design, Engineering, Health
item.description: The Symbiosis Entrance Test (SET) 2014 is a written exam that evaluates candidates for admission to under graduate programs in law, design, engineering, health sciences at Symbiosis International University's (SIU) institutes.

item.title: Andhra Pradesh's ICET 2014: Doorway to an MBA or MCA
item.description: Don't miss out on this article about ICET 2014, if you're planning on pursuing an MBA or MCA in Andhra Pradesh.

item.title: Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University's GGSIPU CET 2014 Exam Schedule
item.description: Planning on getting into Indraprastha University? Read through this article to know more on applying and registering for Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University's CET 2014.

item.title: Birla Institute of Technology (BIT), Mesra invites applications to MBA 2014-16
item.description: Have you appeared for CAT 2013? Apply for the MBA 2014 programme offered by BIT Mesra and its other campuses.

item.title: Tamil Nadu Common Entrance Test (TANCET) 2014 for MBA, MCA, M.E/ M.Tech/ M.Arch/ M.Plan
item.description: Anna University, Chennai, on behalf of the government of Tamil Nadu will conduct the Tamil Nadu Common Entrance Test (TANCET) 2014 for admissions to MBA, MCA, M.E/ M.Tech/ M.Arch/ M.Plan.

item.title: IMI Bhubaneswar invites applications to Post-Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM 2014-2016)
item.description: International Management Institute (IMI,) Bhubaneswar is inviting applications to its PGDM program for academic session 2014-16.

item.title: Jamia Hamdard invites applications to 2014-15 MBA (General) Program
item.description: Jamia Hamdard is inviting applications to its MBA program for the 2014 - 2015 academic session.

item.title: DTU's Delhi School of Management invites applications to MBA 2014-2016
item.description: Are you an MBA aspirant? Did you appear for CAT-2013? Learn more about the MBA programme offered by DTU's Delhi School of Management.

item.title: IIT Kharagpur invites applications to Masters in HR Management through CAT 2013
item.description: Learn more about postgraduate course in Human Resource Management at IIT Kharagpur and selection through CAT 2013.

item.title: MAT (Feb) 2014 MBA exam alert
item.description: Are you planning to join a business school next year? Read more to know about Management Aptitude Test (MAT) 2014 to be conducted in Feb 2014.

item.title: Indian Institute of Forest Management (IIFM) Admissions to PGDFM & FPM Programmes 2014
item.description: Indian Institute of Forest Management (IIFM) is inviting applications for Post Graduate Diploma in Forest Management (PGDFM) and Fellow Programme in Management (FPM) for the 2014 session. Learn about the admission procedure, eligibility criteria and other details required for applying to these courses.

item.title: TERI University invites Admission to M.Sc, MBA, M. Tech and M.A. Programs 2014-15
item.description: Applications to M.Sc, MBA, M. Tech and M.A. Programs 2014 - 2015 invited by TERI university.

item.title: IGNOU to conduct MBA Entrance, OPENMAT XXXV on 2 February, 2014
item.description: Apply by 15 December, 2013 to appear for entrance exam, OPENMAT XXXV, for admission to IGNOU's management programs.

item.title: Faculty of Management Studies (FMS) invites Applications to MBA & Ph.D Programmes 2014
item.description: FMS, Delhi University is inviting applications to its renowned MBA programme and Ph.D programme through CAT 2013 scores.

item.title: SP Jain invites applications for admissions to PG Diploma in Management (PGDM), 2014-2016
item.description: Applications available online from 15 September to 18 November, 2013 for PGDM program.

item.title: Indian Institute of Tourism and Travel Management invites applications to PGDM Courses 2014-2016
item.description: Are you interested in the tourism and travel sector? Learn more about PGDMA courses available in this sector.

item.title: Department of Commerce, DU invites applications to MIB and MHROD 2014-16
item.description: Application invited for MIB and MHROD, Delhi University from 7 October, 2013 to 21 December, 2013.

item.title: MICA Admissions 2014 - 2016 Open, MICAT Online Application Begins
item.description: Applications have been invited for MICAT 2014, last date for submission of form is January 31, 2014

item.title: TISSNET 2013 on 22 Dec for Admissions to Masters Programs by TISS
item.description: TISSNET 2013 for admissions to M.A, M.Sc, MPH and MHA courses 2014 - 2016 offered at TISS campuses.

item.title: Symbiosis International University to conduct SNAP 2013 on 15 Dec for MBA Admissions
item.description: Are you planning to do an MBA? Learn more about the SNAP test for admission to MBA programs offered by colleges under Symbiosis International University.
